titles.title: National Security, Department of State, and Related Programs Appropriations Act, 2026
National Security, Department of State, and Related Programs Appropriations Act, 2026
National Security, Department of State, and Related Programs Appropriations Act, 2026
Making appropriations for National Security, Department of State, and Related Programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Appropriations reported an original measure, H. Rept. 119-217, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 177.
